00010         class AssetController extends EmeController
00011         {

00013                 {
00014                         // Call parent's init method
00015                         parent::init();
00016                         
00017                         $this->after_filter('compress');
00018                 }

00020                 public function index()
00021                 {
00022                         switch ($_GET['ext'])
00023                         {
00024                                 case 'js':
00025                                         $this->mimetype = 'application/x-javascript';
00026                                         break;
00027                                 case 'rss':
00028                                         $this->mimetype = 'application/rss+xml';
00029                                         break;
00030                                 case 'xml':
00031                                         $this->mimetype = 'text/xml';
00032                                         break;
00033                                 case 'css':
00034                                         $this->mimetype = 'text/css';
00035                                         break;
00036                                 default:
00037                                         $this->mimetype = 'text/plain';
00038                         }
00039                         $asset_file = dirname(__FILE__) . '/../assets/' . $_GET['dir'] . '/' . $_GET['file'] . '.' . $_GET['ext'];
00040                         
00041                         $this->response->body = file_get_contents($asset_file);
00042 
00043                         $this->response->add_header('Content-Type', $this->mimetype);
00044                         $this->response->add_header('Cache-Control', 'max-age=86400');
00045                         $this->response->add_header('Pragma', 'max-age=86400');
00046                         $this->response->add_header('Last-Modified', gmstrftime('%a, %d %b %Y %H:%M:%S %Z', filemtime($asset_file)));
00047                         $this->response->add_header('Date', gmstrftime('%a, %d %b %Y %H:%M:%S %Z'));
00048                         $this->response->add_header('Expires', gmstrftime('%a, %d %b %Y %H:%M:%S %Z', time() + 86400));
00049 
00050                         $this->render(NULL);
00051                 }
00052         }
